metadata.title: CVE-2022-3048 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Chrome OS lockscreen in Google Chrome onChrome OS prior to 105.0.5195.52 allowed a local attacker to bypasslockscreen navigation restrictions via physical access to the device.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
